title: Outdoor Living with Grilling Area, Group Exercise Classes, Pet Park
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '1111', 'Address:', '1155 Lavista Rd NE', 'Open the door to a new experience in apartment living.', "The Reserve at Lavista Walk is your Intown Getaway as you're minutes away from anything you could want or need, yet set apart from all of the hustle and bustle in a zen retreat.", 'Move away from the familiarity of every day apartment living with four courtyards featuring resort-style swimming pools, impeccably landscaped Zen gardens with outdoor grilling pavilions and 24/7 state-of-the-art -fitness center.', 'The Reserve at Lavista Walk features luxurious studio, one, two and three bedroom apartment homes with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and washer and dryer included in all homes.', 'The Reserve at Lavista Walk offers floor plans that strike a perfect balance of traditional and contemporary.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Patio/Balcony', 'Package Concierge', '11’ Ceilings', 'Hardwood/Ceramic Tiled Floors', 'Zen Garden/Pool Views', 'Zen Garden', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Expansive Studio, One, Two & Three-Bedroom Apartments', 'Night Patrol', 'Clubhouse', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Contact today for the most up to date information!']
